title: Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka☆Magica Gaiden (TV)
alternative_title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story: Magia Record (TV), マギアレコード 魔法少女まどか☆マギカ外伝 (TV)
description: The new heroine of Magia Record is Iroha, a magical girl on the hunt for her missing sister Ui in Kamihama. Also in Kamihama is Madoka, who's searching for the similarly-missing Homura.
